00052         class ApplicationSelf : public Application {
00053             friend class Application;
00054         public:
00055 
00056             const vector<string> & arguments() {
00057                 return _arguments;
00058             }
00059 
00060             const string & appName() {
00061                 return _appName;
00062             }
00063 
00064             AppType appType();

00067             void fail(const string & reason, const string & file, int line);
00068 
00069

00071             virtual const File * getResourceDir() = 0;
00072             virtual const File * getPrefix() = 0;
00073 
00074         protected:
00075             void _fail(const string & appName, const string & reason);
00076             void _fail(const string & appName, const string & reason,
00077                     const string & file, int line);
00078 
00079         private:
00080             void _preconstruct();
00081             vector<string> _arguments;
00082             string _appName;
00083             AppType _appType;
00084 
00085             ApplicationSelf(int argc, char * argv[], char * apple[]) : _arguments(argv, argv + argc) {
00086                 _preconstruct();
00087                 construct(argc, argv, apple);
00088             }
00089             virtual ~ApplicationSelf();
00090             virtual void construct(int argc, char * argv[], char * apple[]) = 0;
